## IControllerKeyboardEvent interface

Base interface for all controller keyboard events.

Provides key identification along with standard modifier flags.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface IControllerKeyboardEvent<T extends string> extends IBaseEvent<T>, IModKey 
```
**Extends:** [IBaseEvent](doc/markdown/./scene.ibaseevent.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;, [IModKey](doc/markdown/./scene.imodkey.md)
